I apologize for the likely trivial problem, but unfortunately my Google searches haven't found the answer.

Right now, every object in my game will show a "take" option (underneath "look at"). I'm trying to set up a simple machine that's bolted to the ground, so while you can use it, you can't take it. In the Inventory tab, object can be taken is NOT checked.

So how do I remove the phrase "take" from the little drop-down menu when I click on an object's hyperlink?

Thanks.

Posts.EditableText:
On the second tab for each object, at the bottom, there are lists for the verbs.

More details here (but probably overkill for this):
https://github.com/ThePix/quest/wiki/Using-Display-and-Inventory-Verbs-Successfully
